name: Escape the Nightmare
description:
NOTE: There seems to be an error causing significant drops in framerate on Google Chrome, but it appears to work fine if your browser is firefox

Created for the "Courage" themed Minijam

Objective: To defeat the Nightmare Guardian

Controls:

  • Left-click party member, and right-click enemy to set target
  • You can see enemy attack damage, health (courage) and xp reward before finalizing your attacks
  • After starting the battle, your party will attack, followed by the surviving monsters, and then the battle ends
  • After the battle, you can choose to move to the next battle, or go to a Safe Haven to heal, upgrade your party and recruit new members
  • You must face the Nightmare Guardian and stronger monsters every time you leave a Safe Haven
